articles.title: ‘Attack on our way of life’: Debate around autonomous vehicles heats up in Boston
articles.description:
The Boston City Council is debating regulations on autonomous vehicles. A proposed ordinance would mandate that they have “human safety operators” physically present inside.

The post ‘Attack on our way of life’: Debate around autonomous vehicles heats up in Boston appeared first on Boston.com.
